original_text: And whenever Moses went out to the tent, all the people rose and stood at the entrances to their tents, watching Moses until he entered the tent.
korean_text: 모세가 회막으로 나아갈 때에는 백성이 다 일어나 자기 장막 문에 서서 모세가 회막에 들어가기까지 바라보며

sentences.original_text: And whenever Moses went out to the tent
and stood at the entrances to their tents
watching Moses until he entered the tent
